scenario.description: You find yourself in a anomalous small village. A merchant's cart has been overturned, spilling valuable goods.

choices.text: Help the paradoxical merchant gather their goods
choices.result: The merchant thanks you profusely and offers a peculiar small reward.

choices.text: Pretend not to notice and walk away
choices.result: You avoid the bizarre situation entirely.

choices.text: Steal some valuable items while helping
choices.result: You manage to pocket some items without being noticed.

result: The merchant thanks you profusely and offers a ethereal small reward.

scenario.description: In the bizarre village square, you witness a uncanny heated argument between two merchants over a uncanny rare artifact.

choices.result: Both merchants appreciate your fair judgment.

choices.text: Side with the anomalous merchant offering you a anomalous bribe
choices.result: You receive a bizarre generous reward but feel guilty.

choices.text: Steal the otherworldly artifact during the otherworldly confusion
choices.result: You successfully steal the paradoxical valuable artifact.

result: Both merchants appreciate your fair judgment.
